about_the_game:
Fighting crime and saving lives. And... surviving ravenous hordes of bloodthirsty undead? The men and women of Horror City's Police and Fire Services sure do have their work cut out for them.

Made for use with the ever growing POP! art style, creator Vexed Enigma has put together a character pack featuring 8 brand new characters themed around Fire and Police services, each with an extra alternative color scheme for convenient variation. Featuring a variety of skin tones and body types, with full facesets, zombie versions and downed/dead poses, this character pack is perfect for spicing up your POP! Horror City creations!



Features:

  • Made for use with POP! Resources and formatted for use in RPG Maker VX Ace
  • 8 unique Police & Fire Service Characters with matching sprites and facesets, plus a color variant for each
  • 20 faceset sheets featuring full emotion sets for each character plus zombie facesets
  • Zombie and downed/dead versions of each character, with non-gory versions included for the squeamish
  • Brand new POP! sprite and faceset bases included featuring plus size and elderly characters
  • 8 new "Power Up" objects themed around Police & Fire services including Handcuffs, Guns, Fire Extinguishers and more!

Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
